00052 using namespace std;
00053 
00054 NIVissimNodeDef_Poly::NIVissimNodeDef_Poly(int id, const std::string& name,
00055         const PositionVector& poly)
00056     : NIVissimNodeDef_Edges(id, name, NIVissimNodeParticipatingEdgeVector()),
00057       myPoly(poly) {}
00058 
00059 
00060 NIVissimNodeDef_Poly::~NIVissimNodeDef_Poly() {}
00061 
00062 
00063 bool
00064 NIVissimNodeDef_Poly::dictionary(int id, const std::string& name,
00065                                  const PositionVector& poly) {
00066     NIVissimNodeDef_Poly* o = new NIVissimNodeDef_Poly(id, name, poly);
00067     if (!NIVissimNodeDef::dictionary(id, o)) {
00068         delete o;
00069         assert(false);
00070         return false;
00071     }
00072     return true;
00073 }

00086 SUMOReal
00087 NIVissimNodeDef_Poly::getEdgePosition(int edgeid) const
00088 {
00089     NIVissimEdge *edge = NIVissimEdge::dictionary(edgeid);
00090     return edge->crossesAtPoint(
00091         Position(myBoundary->xmin(), myBoundary->ymin()),

00096 
00097 void
00098 NIVissimNodeDef_Poly::searchAndSetConnections(SUMOReal offset) {
00099     IntVector within = NIVissimAbstractEdge::getWithin(myPoly, offset);
00100     IntVector connections;
00101     IntVector edges;
00102     Boundary boundary(myPoly.getBoxBoundary());
00103     for (IntVector::const_iterator i = within.begin(); i != within.end(); i++) {
00104         NIVissimConnection* c =
00105             NIVissimConnection::dictionary(*i);
00106         NIVissimEdge* e =
00107             NIVissimEdge::dictionary(*i);
00108         if (c != 0) {
00109             connections.push_back(*i);
00110             c->setNodeCluster(myID);
00111         }
00112         if (e != 0) {
00113             edges.push_back(*i);
00114         }
00115     }
00116     NIVissimConnectionCluster* c =
00117         new NIVissimConnectionCluster(connections, boundary, myID, edges);
00118     for (IntVector::iterator j = edges.begin(); j != edges.end(); j++) {
00119         NIVissimEdge* edge = NIVissimEdge::dictionary(*j);
00120         edge->myConnectionClusters.push_back(c);
00121     }
00122 }
